Introduction

Soyou (소유) is a South Korean singer under Starship Entertainment. She was the lead vocalist of the girl group SISTAR.

She made her solo debut on December 13, 2017 with the album Re:Born.

Fun facts

1
Soyou was supposed to debut as a member of 4Minute back when she was still a trainee at Cube Entertainment. However, the company eventually postponed her debut because they thought she was still lacking in some areas. She was then replaced by Sohyun.
